text: A collaborative research b/w @ICGEBNewDelhi &  @csir_ncl has reported that new compounds show better efficacy than the presently used anti-malarial #drugs, #chloroquine & #artemisinin. This will help combat the #MDR #malaria-causing #parasite #Plasmodium. https://t.co/XEqMHd1Dco https://t.co/12x4e0k6n7
